title: Identification
fullText:
Extra low voltage installation wiring conductors shall be clearly identified to indicate their intended function. Refer to the owner's manual to determine the intended function.
Conductors with green or green-yellow combination coloured insulation or sheathing shall only be used as protective earthing or equipotential bonding conductors in installation wiring.
NOTE 1 Conductors with green insulation or sheathing may be used for ADR purposes (vehicle roadworthy wiring systems).
NOTE 2 The use of alternative colours to LV wiring systems for identification of ELV wiring systems is recommended.
